See also: möbel and møbel

German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Möbel
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

Borrowed from French meuble (“furniture”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈmøːbl̩/, /ˈmøːbəl/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Möbel n (genitive Möbels, plural Möbel, diminutive Möbelchen n)

  1. furniture
  2. piece of furniture

Declension[edit]

Declension of Möbel

indef.def.noundef.noun

dativeeinemdemMöbeldenMöbeln

  • möbliert

Descendants[edit]
